about_the_game:
"What wish is worth forgetting who you are?"

You will step into the shoes of Jett Miller, an ex-cop that turned in to a private investigator. He was hired by the family of a young university student, Anna Davis, who disappeared without a trace or any evidence of leaving the building where she lived.

You will have to explore the building where she resided, searching for clues overlooked by the police and solving puzzles. The investigation path you choose will lead you to different endings.

Features:

  • Realistic Graphics.
  • Detailed Environment.
  • Minimal User Interface.
  • Puzzle Resolution.
  • Free Exploration.
  • Multiple Endings.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains elements of violence, nudity and terror that may be disturbing to some audiences.

name: Wish Eater

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2070 / AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Wish Eater is a horror game with touches of action where you explore a building in search of a girl who disappeared without a trace. Solve puzzles, search for clues and recreate her steps to discover the mystery of her disappearance. Depending on the investigation you will reach different endings.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
